Commands.Sketch Summon: Self: 3 turns MAX BRV Up IGroup BRV attack of element of equipped summon (other than Sylph)Group HP attack after summon's effectHP damage sharedEquipping following summons triggers special effect:  Sylph: Grants BRV and restores party's HP based on own ATK (no group BRV attack)  Odin: Moderate chance of inflicting Break  Pandemonium: Easier knock back
Commands.Sketch: Magic BRV attackTarget: 1 turn SketchSelf: 5 turns ATK Up IGrants additional turn after target's turn while Sketch is active; does not add to turn count
Commands.Star Prism: 6-HIT AoE magic BRV+HP attackBRV Hits will be dispersed if there are multiple enemiesBRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRVHP Damage is split equally amongst targetsInflicts Sketch to all enemies for 2 turns

Artifacts.Buffed Guard: Raises Defense Power by 10% while buffed.
Artifacts.Future Genius Artist Boost: Increases the effects of Future Genius Artist by 5%.
Artifacts.Mighty Sketch Summon: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Sketch Summon by 10%.
Artifacts.Mighty Sketch: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Sketch by 10%.

Passives.Sketch Summon Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Sketch Summon.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Fast Writing Proficiency: Slightly raises party's Speed while buffed.
Passives.Sketch Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Sketch.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Sketch Summon Charge: Increases the max uses of Sketch Summon by 1.
Passives.Sketch Charge: Increases the max uses of Sketch by 1.
Passives.Future Genius Artist: Slightly raises party's Max BRV and Attack if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Sketch Summon Focused Attack: Largely increases BRV damage when attacking single target with group attack
Passives.Sketch Summon Extension: When using Sketch Summon: Slight BRV damage boost Slight MAX BRV Up boost 6 turns SPD Up IIUpon using Sketch Summon: BRV Attack becomes powerful BRV Attack+ for 6 turns
Passives.All Buffed Attack Boost: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Sketch Extension: Sketch use +2When using Sketch: Slight damage boost Slight ATK Up boostSketch becomes Sketch+ after useWhen using Sketch+: Moves next turn to before target on hit (except during summoning) Inflicts 1 turn Blind

Weapons.Chocobo Brush: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Sketch Summon.Raises the potency of Max BRV Up and extends its duration.
